extensionDescription.message: Multi-Account Containers helps you keep all the parts of your online life contained in different tabs. Custom labels and color-coded tabs help keep different activities — like online shopping, travel planning, or checking work email — separate.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Multi-Account Containers".

openNewTabInThisContainer.message: Open New Tab in this Container

openTabs.description: Section title for tabs that are currently open in that container

moveTabsToANewWindow.message: Move Tabs to a New Window

onboarding-1-header.message: A better way to manage all the things you do online

onboarding-1-description.message: Use Containers to organize tasks, manage accounts, and keep your focus where you want it.

onboarding-2-header.message: Put Containers to work for you.

onboarding-2-description.message: Features like color-coding and separate Container tabs help you find things easily, focus your attention, and minimize distractions.

onboarding-3-header.message: A place for everything, and everything in its place.

onboarding-3-description.message: Start with the Containers we’ve created, or create your own.

onboarding-4-header.message: Always open sites in the Containers you want.

onboarding-4-description.message: Right-click inside a Container tab to assign the site to always open in the Container.

onboarding-5-header.message: Container tabs when you need them.

onboarding-5-description.message: Long-press the New Tab button to create a new Container tab.

onboarding-6-description.message: Turn on sync to share Container and site assignments with any computer connected to your Firefox account.

onboarding-7-header.message: Firefox account is required to sync.

onboarding-7-description.message: Click Sign In to confirm that your Firefox account is active.

onboarding-8-description.message: Now Containers can integrate with Mozilla VPN or your own proxy to create a secure, private connection that protects your activity.

spreadTheWord.message: If you enjoy Containers, help us spread the word!

removeThisContainerConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to remove this Container?

info.description: Alternative text for the i icon in the toolbar icon pop-up

openThisSiteConfirmation.message: Open this site in your assigned Container?

wouldYouStillLikeToOpenConfirmation.message: Would you still like to open in this current Container?

rememberMyDecision.message: Remember my decision for this site

onboardingToggle.message: Toggle this to see the onboarding panels again.

enableBookMarkMenusDescription.message: This setting allows you to open a bookmark or folder of bookmarks in a Container.

enableSyncDescription.message: This setting allows you to sync your Containers and site assignments across devices.

syncExcludeDescription.message: Exclude containers from sync when their name matches the specified case insensitive regular expression.

replaceTab.message: Replace tab instead of creating a new one

replaceTabDescription.message: Replace the current tab if a page which is assigned to another Container is opened (instead of keeping the current tab open). Opening tabs with middle mouse button is not affected.

editWhichContainer.message: Edit which Container is opened when using the numbered shortcuts.

keyboardShortCut.message: Container to open with Keyboard Shortcut $keyId$

confirmNavigationTitle.description: This is the title of a confirmation page. Please do not translate "Multi-Account Containers".

openInNoContainer.description: This is the button text in confirmation page when we are not inside a container

youAskedFirefox.message: You asked Firefox to always open $containerName$ for this site:

chooseLocation.description: Location refers to the geographical position used by the VPN

protectYourContainers.message: Protect your Containers with Mozilla VPN

protectThisContainer.message: Protect this Container with Mozilla VPN

useCustomLocation.message: Use a custom location for this Container

invalidProxyAlert.message: Please enter a valid proxy URL

mozillaVpnMustBeOn.message: Mozilla VPN must be on to use this feature.

proxyNowAvailable.message: Now with Mozilla VPN and advanced proxy settings

tooltipWarning.message: This Container is set up to use a Mozilla VPN proxy, but Mozilla VPN is not on. Turn Mozilla VPN on to use this Container.

integratewithmozillavpn.message: Integrate your Containers with Mozilla VPN

nativeMessagingPermissionTitle.message: Allow extension to exchange messages with programs other than Firefox

nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.message: This setting allows the extension to exchange messages with the Mozilla VPN client and is required for Mozilla VPN integration features to work.
nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.description: 'This setting' refers to the permission indicated in nativeMessagingPermissionTitle

proxyPermissionTitle.message: Allow extension to control proxy settings

proxyPermissionDescription.message: This allows you to use advanced proxy settings and enable Mozilla VPN integration features.
proxyPermissionDescription.description: 'This' refers to the permission indicated in proxyPermissionTitle

additionalPermissionNeeded.message: This feature requires an additional permission to work. Permissions can be disabled at any time on the settings page.
additionalPermissionNeeded.description: 'This feature' is the browser proxy permission. This string appears on the 'Advanced Proxy Settings' panel when the proxy permission is disabled.

mozillaVpnRequiresAdditionalPermissions.message: Integration with Mozilla VPN requires a subscription and additional permissions to work.

integrateContainers.message: Integrate your Containers with Mozilla VPN

theme.description: Theme section title in the option page

themeAuto.description: Default value for the theme option select tag

themeLight.description: Value for the theme option select tag

themeDark.description: Value for the theme option select tag

filterInputLabel.description: Label for the filter input in the main panel. Only visible for screen reader.

imageAltContainerInfo.description: Alt text for right-arrow button to view container info

defaultContainerLabel.description: The title of the default container

openContainerPanel.description: Label for option in the keyboard shortcut manager (associating a shortcut to open the container panel)

containerShortcut.description: Label for option in the keyboard shortcut manager. $keyId$ is a number from 1 to 10.
